match: Borussia Dortmund to 'pull together' against Monaco after explosions damage bus
info: "Shocked" Borussia Dortmund players will "pull together" when they face Monaco, 24 hours after their team bus was damaged by explosions.

match: Wladimir Klitschko: Anthony Joshua will be 'facing Mount Everest' for heavyweight title
info: Wladimir Klitschko warns Anthony Joshua that fighting him for the heavyweight title will be like "facing Mount Everest".

match: Fed Cup: Great Britain name unchanged team
info: Great Britain name a Fed Cup team of Johanna Konta, Heather Watson, Laura Robson and Jocelyn Rae for their tie against Romania.
Paulo Dybala scores twice as Juventus take charge of their Champions League quarter-final tie with Barcelona.

match: Atletico Madrid v Leicester: How do Foxes win Champions League quarter-final?
info: Driven by the pain of two final defeats, Atletico Madrid are fearsome Champions League opponents for Leicester, writes Andy West.

match: MCC confirms sendings-off and other laws to come in on 1 October
info: The MCC confirms that a series of law changes - including the introduction of sendings-off - will come into effect on 1 October.
